actions.text: Amendment SA 1227 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1227 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Breaux to Amendment SA 1217. (consideration: CR S9315-9316; text: CR S9316) To make available from the amounts available for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, $4,000,000 for Navy Integrated Manufacturing Development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1227 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1227 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Breaux to Amendment SA 1217.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To make available from the amounts available for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, $4,000,000 for Navy Integrated Manufacturing Development.
